Generation VII.Sun: A delectable aroma pours from its body. They are often swallowed whole by Toucannon lured by that wafting deliciousness.
Generation VII.Moon: Although it's too sugary for human consumption, Bounsweet's sweat can be watered down into a juice with just the right amount of sweetness.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Because of its sweet, delicious aroma, bird Pokémon are always after it, but it's not intelligent enough to care.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It tries to resist being swallowed by a bird Pokémon by spinning the sepals on its head. It's usually a fruitless attempt.

Generation VIII.Sword: Its body gives off a sweet, fruity scent that is extremely appetizing to bird Pokémon.
Generation VIII.Shield: When under attack, it secretes a sweet and delicious sweat. The scent only calls more enemies to it.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Its sweat is sweet, like syrup made from boiled-down fruit. Because of this, Bounsweet was highly valued in the past, when sweeteners were scarce.
Generation IX.Violet: A Greedent drawn in by the sweet scent of these Pokémon will tuck the Bounsweet in among the berries in its tail and carry them all away.

Generation VII.Sun: Lush Jungle Trade Lillipup at Route 5
Generation VII.Moon: Lush Jungle Trade Lillipup at Route 5

Generation VIII.Sword: Rolling Fields , Dappled Grove , West Lake Axewell , Watchtower Ruins , East Lake Axewell , Stony Wilderness Dappled Grove , Giant's Mirror ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Rolling Fields , Dappled Grove , West Lake Axewell , Watchtower Ruins , East Lake Axewell , Stony Wilderness Dappled Grove , Giant's Mirror ( Max Raid Battle )

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One , Area Two East Province: Area One , Area Two Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Two East Province: Area One , Area Two Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
